description: Try our easy to follow Berry Mousse Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Berry Mousse Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, run a spatula around mousse cake to loosen. Remove from tin and transfer to a cake plate. Unroll chocolate (it will form shards as you unroll). Spread whipped cream around side of cake and press on chocolate shards. Top with berries and serve.
